divs: Sighting Details Sorry for my bad English, this is an area where Indians live and where in the night are all kinds of UFO, the saucers, cigar and even those who have no way, I saw them from afar, but near the end I never I have touched. Once I saw a squadron of five ships with metal (the only metal that I've seen) flying to the one p.m.. This time was with a friend of EL PAUJI. Here I have seen different types. Once we saw a huge, 2.5 km and also have seen people being incredulous and that is very good because they change their lives. other metal vessels are not as nebulous as if they were powdered with stars. Even after being with the Sen Sei, we saw one coming from Orion. It came down very fast and suddenly began to widen and become bigger and bigger until it entered the atmosphere and started to disappear but continued to feel and started to hurt our ears, to feel nausea and the little finger would not stop moving, and electrocuted as a download and when I was told: "No pain, no pain, but without any pain" .. We must ask, because they believe that support for these dimensions are very dense and when you begin to have contact with other worlds, it hurts. The vibrations tend to descomponerte and that hurts. I saw two ships and a couple others. I saw a big and small. The first wave saw him coming out of them and some gold items such as the mesh around Christ. Then I saw the match and emerged as a golden ray of light in all directions.I said that there was an energy gate and a tunnel in the direction of the craft; cross halfway and then came the fear in me, questioned whether we were following the right path, and then lost display.. Remember that the 2012 is managed as a closed cycle. Of us depend on this time line is changing is the total destruction of the race. What happens is that one tends to say "not today, tomorrow ...." NO! That he should forget the whole world tomorrow, perhaps no longer exists. sorry for the English, I know you did not express myself very well, but if you want .. come and we do a reunion together in ���" LA GRAN SABANA " There are portals here in the "GRAN SABANA" and around the world .. really is a magical place, really I have many anecdotes that do not express. Goodbye..
Summary: Sightings every day in " EL PAUJI" a rural area in Venezuela.
